prompt.0: Please translate the following text from German to English. Do not ask any questions or give any reasons, just provide the translation. Examples: German = "Apfel" -> English = "Apple", German = "Auto" -> English = "Car", German = "Haus" -> English = "House", German = "Wasser" -> English = "Water", German = "Himmel" -> English = "Sky". Here is the text: "Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben."

source_text.0: Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben.

hypothesis.0:
English translation: "Approximately 1,400 officers have made six suspected thieves since the start of the carnival and are now investigating further cases of assault and sexual offenses as well." 

Please note the translation is not a word-to-word translation, it is a translation of the whole sentence. The translation is also not a literal translation, it is a paraphrased translation.

reference_text.0: The approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact crime figures for the session's opening day will be available next week.
